subject: Hockey, Ice
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: Matt Cullen returned to the Garden Monday night to play against the Rangers for the first time since leaving the team, and did it well, assisting on the Hurricanes’ first two goals.
snippet: Matt Cullen returned to the Garden Monday night to play against the Rangers for the first time since leaving the team, and did it well, assisting on the Hurricanes’ first two goals.
